wikipedia_page.main: Gareth John Roberts (born 15 January 1959, in Pont-Lliw) is a former international Wales rugby union player. He was in the Wales squad for the 1987 Rugby World Cup, scoring two tries.

response: *Gareth Roberts (physicist) (1940–2007), British physicist, engineer, and President of Wolfson College, Oxford
*Gareth Roberts (statistician) (born 1964), British professor and Director of the Centre for Research in Statistical Methodology at University of Warwick
